Text:
If your wondering why the upload stops sometimes, its cause my ISP is "fixing" the lines in my "neighbourhood" :). 

I will send the files to some friends soon so that they can help me seed.

When i try to extract the files with winrar it says: "no archives found in selected files and folders"
So can some1 tell me whats the problem.
Hi! I downloaded all parts (20 parts), but i dont know how to extract cause winrar doesnt recognize them...
do we have to create a archive with all parts?? please say something!!!!!!
winrar doesn't seem to work...  7zip works perfectly in extracting those files =)
some maps dont work, even in patch 1.71

Works perfect with 7zip ... u just need to extract the first file (ie : Scenarios.7z.001) and the rest files will extract all by itself ... (that is loads of maps to check em all but most of i have played were working fine in game ) ... the good part is i got a pretty nice speed of 200KB/sec even after such long time of this torrent  there r still 7 seeders (including me)  for this as on 10-june-2011 ... really great stuff from both the uploader and the guys helping it keep alive and kicking .... thanks a milloin to every one associated ... appreciate the effort ... keep it up n i will do the same
nice torrent, thanks. works perfect with coh v2.602. my version of winrar wouldnt extract it, but 7 zip works fine.
why theres no WW2 folder in my /Users/ username/ Documents/ My Games/ Company of Heroes / ?
@scamlol,  ww2 folder is the main coh  folder. if its missing, you need to re-install the game.
you people need to start seeding or im bailing out. everybody is using the "hit and run". only me and the uploader are seeding , yet i see people downloading this every day from us.
